Botticelli

Checklist for stocking bar

  1. Ask the bar what they need to top up in Bar Fridge and grab it from the big fridge in the pass.
  2. Make a list of what you need to fill up all empty spots.
  3. Grab a crate and go to the cool room.
  4. Once the Bar fridges are full, make sure you top up every row in the cool room.
  5. If you are not sure where to find the wines, beers or soft drinks, refer to the list / QR stick in the right hand door of the middle cupboard next to the cool room.
  6. Top up Big and Small San Pellegrino Sparkling Mineral Water.
